name: Too Squired
description:
A short game created for the DK30 game jam. 

You are a humble squire quested to explore a dungeon with your knight mentor. The only problem is, the knight has a knack for getting himself into trouble. While the knight will inevitably get himself killed, you need to guide and protect him to keep yourself safe from whatever terrors may lurk.

Project Contributors:

Alexandr Škaryd (Glademist)

Glenn Jackson (LightTemplar)

Jeremie Wallis (Whytmage)
